data.name: Click Lovers
data.detailed_description:
This is a casual strategy game of "click to eliminate + battle". During the erasing time, players can click more than 2 identical gems to eliminate, and accumulate attack power. The more eliminations, the higher the attack power. During the battle phase, it will attack the enemy with the removed attack power, or be attacked by the enemy. After defeating the enemy, you will get corresponding talent points and corresponding various exquisite CG rewards. In the face of all kinds of beautiful girl type enemies, how will you choose?

Click to eliminate enough gems within the specified time to attack the enemy, and the enemy will counterattack after the end of each round. The damage caused by the player each round can be displayed on the screen, and the damage caused is proportional to the player's attack power and the number of blocks eliminated by the player.

data.short_description: Make full use of your fingers to interact with beautiful girls in various ways~
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Portuguese, Portuguese - Brazil, Spanish - Latin America

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 7/8/10
  • Processor: inter core i3
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

content_descriptors.notes:
This game may not contain content for all ages and may not be suitable for viewing at work.

Users can see in-game characters wearing revealing clothing or posing suggestive.
